SELECT mrrp.responsible_party_id responsiblePartyId, mrrp.maintenance_record_id maintenanceRecordId, mrrp.proportion, mrrp.responsible_party_type responsiblePartyType,
bs.storefront_name responsiblePartyName, bs.storefront_logo image
IF(m.name IS NULL OR m.name="",m.nick_name,m.name) responsiblePartyName, m.head image
FROM dj_maintenance_record_responsible_party mrrp
,dj_basics_storefront bs
,dj_member m
WHERE 1=1
AND mrrp.responsible_party_id = bs.id
AND mrrp.responsible_party_id = m.id
AND mrrp.id=#{id}
